titles.title: A bill to amend section 2680(a) of title 28, United States Code, to narrow the discretionary function exception to the Federal Tort Claims Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/27/1988--Introduced. Amends the Federal Tort Claims Act to provide that the Government may be held liable for damages resulting from negligent acts committed during the implementation of a discretionary function or duty. States that the exception provided policy decisions respecting such discretionary functions or duties shall continue.
